help: Opens an Interaction Dialog with a muted video playing on loop once console is closed. Optional Args: wc - with controls - 'color:r,g,b' and 'textcolor:r,g,b' optional arguments for control color scheme. Optional file id defined in settings.json (See mods/VideoLib/settings.json and mods/VideoLib/data/videos)
Gives all planets in the player location ufos flying around until they leave the system or restart

Adds a Campaign Billboard to the player's location. By default will orbit the nearest planet or star with 15 day orbit period. Option args (without quotes, args denoted by prefix before colon): "name:Name" - Entity name | "type:YourType" - defined in custom_entities.json | "faction:FactionId" - faction of the billboard entity, affects holo projector color. | NoOrbit - Will not orbit | FaceFleet - will automatically rotate to face the closest fleet | FaceOrbitFocus - billboard will face its orbit focus.
